front.title: The Use Case of Autonomic Traffic Management in the Artificial Intelligence Data Center

author.organization: Beijing University of Posts and Telecommunications
Beijing University of Posts and Telecommunications

abstract.t: This document describes the use case of autonomic traffic management in the Artificial Intelligence Data Center (AIDC), including the requirements and two management mechanisms, based on the distributed model and the centralized controlling model. It proposed to use the IETF GRASP protocol for the information exchanging, resource negotiation, control signalling, and etc.
